biotools.summary: Atri-U is a tool for assisted image analysis in routine cardiovascular magnetic resonance volumetry of the left atrium. Atri-U is an automated data analysis pipeline for long-axis cardiac cine images, computes the atrial volume by: (i) detecting the end-systolic frame, (ii) outlining the endocardial borders of the LA, (iii) localizing the mitral annular hinge points and constructing the longitudinal atrial diameters, equivalent to the usual workup done by clinicians.
